Flexible participation options

Kyiv Post Employment Fair offers four participation options which will fit your company’s needs and values



HR Brand

Reinforce your company’s HR brand and present it as a great place to work at



Fast Hiring Process

Save time, money and human resources to directly connect with 2000 potential applicants



Recruiting experience

Learn recruiting experience of other market players and stay updated with current HR trend



Brand Exposure

Enjoy publicity offered by the event by advertising your company in the EF promotion materials



Company booth

Place your company’s branded booth to tell applicants about career opportunities in your office



Seminar / Workshop

Book a 30-minute seminar or workshop to tell applicants about your company’s success story



Absentee participation

If your company’s representatives cannot be present, we still have few options for you.



General sponsor

Get two options in one package plus exclusive Kyiv Post bonus for advertising both in print and online

Our speakers

During the Employment Fair a series of motivational lectures and seminars are conducted. Their aim is to inspire employees to shoot high in their career plans, as well as to offer useful tips on how to achieve their ambitious goals

Geoffrey R. Pyatt

U.S Ambassador to Ukraine

Careers in government and foreign service. Fall 2014

Yulia Marushevska

Deputy Odesa Oblast Governor

World without borders. Fall 2015

Brian Bonner

Marketing

Careers in media. Fall 2014

Nataliya Bugayova

Kyiv Post chief executive officer

How to get into Harvard? Spring 2015

Patrol Police

Recruitment requirements. Fall 2015

World without borders. Fall 2015

Sergiy Gusovsky

Restaurateur

Owner of a restaurant: peculiarities of the business.

Feedback

“We were happy to participate in the Employment Fair! Everything was great. We met a lot of students and young specialists and had job interviews with some of them. Now we have candidates for junior positions.”


— Yulia Sytnik, Mazars Ukraine

“Participation in the event allowed the company to hire highly qualified specialists in different fields. At the Employment Fair, companies have great opportunities to present themselves as employers and find outstanding professionals who have excellent communication skills, can work in a team, and who are proficient in foreign languages.”


— Ivan Synyakov, NJSC Naftogaz of Ukraine

“The Kyiv Post Employment Fair is a useful and modern initiative which helps gather highly professional candidates and future specialists in one place. We are always glad to take part in such events with our PwC Academy master classes.”


— Irina Blinova, PwC
